title: About Me
introduction:
Born and raised in Osaka, currently living in Tokyo.
Majored in Information Science at the Faculty of Science and Engineering, and belonged to a Natural Language Processing lab. Experienced in a wide range of development, mainly web applications, including back-end, front-end, and batch processing. Interested in NLP since my student days, and currently developing a language learning app that utilizes YouTube subtitles and generative AI.
